content: We really just need to amend the ADA to issue IDs or permits — require states to ‘shall issue’ without fee and without waits longer than a week — so that these arguments would be solved quickly without having to reveal anything other than a tag and a symbol. Same for guide animals. Conscientious use needs to be normalized. I don’t know how to deal with hot dogs, but this would be a start. (We don’t have a license system because it had been abused by states to refuse access.)
